message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.DM, cs.CR 

This paper deals with the problem of imbalanced data classification, which is a common issue in machine learning. The paper proposes a method of instance selection to improve the classification accuracy, which is a topic that falls under the sub-category of machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the theoretical conditions for improving the classification accuracy, which could be considered as a topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The experimental study conducted in the paper involves using benchmark datasets, which could be classified under computer vision (cs.CV) or data mining (cs.DM). Finally, the paper also discusses the limitations of existing methods for handling imbalanced data, which could be considered as a topic in computer security (cs.CR).
